name: Requirements Document
description: Defines the problem, target users, measurable objectives, and acceptance criteria for a product or feature. Includes personas, KPIs, and risks with mitigations.

sections.title: Personas & Scenarios
sections.content: List 2â€“3 personas with goals, pain points, and key scenarios. Include accessibility and locale considerations.

sections.title: Objectives & KPIs
sections.content: Explicit, measurable outcomes (e.g., conversion +10%, P95 latency < 250ms). Include north-star metrics and guardrails.

sections.title: Acceptance Criteria
sections.content: Checklist of observable behaviors and edge cases. Should be testable and unambiguous.

sections.title: Dependencies & Risks
sections.content: Integrations and blocking assumptions. Risks with mitigations (e.g., rate limits, data quality, compliance).
